meanings.sent1: The dreamers imagined flying through the clouds.
meanings.sent2: Many dreamers enjoy exploring their subconscious while they sleep.
meanings.sent3: The dreamers believed they could talk to animals in their dreams.
meanings.sent4: She was a dreamer, always reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The group of dreamers painted their dreams on a shared canvas.

meanings.definition: A person who is idealistic or impractical.
meanings.sent1: The dreamers envisioned a world without any problems.
meanings.sent2: Some dreamers strive for perfection in an imperfect world.
meanings.sent3: The dreamers thought they could build a castle made of clouds.
meanings.sent4: He was a dreamer, chasing after impossible dreams.
meanings.sent5: The dreamers believed they could change the world with their ideas.
